name: Omegamon_X
description: Omnimon X is an enhanced version of Omnimon whose armor has become sharper and more elaborate. The Crest of Courage on the Brave Shield Omega and the combined symbol of the Crests of Courage and Friendship on its chest have been replaced by As'ma Green . It also has Asm'a Green on its knees and on its Grey Sword. Its WarGreymon and MetalGarurumon heads have been replaced by WarGreymon X and MetalGarurumon X heads respectively. The DigiCode on its Grey Sword reads オールデリート ( オールデリート , Ōru Derīto ? , lit. "All Delete") .
